title: Dave Gahan - LSTUMM288 - Hourglass - Remixes (2008)
description:
Artist: Dave Gahan
Album: Hourglass - Remixes
Label: Mute
Catalog #: LSTUMM288
Country: EU
Format: 12"
Release year: 2008
EAN code: 5099952244810
Matrix:
80433 1A 5224481 MIKE'S TM - THE EXCHANGE
80433 1B 5224481 MIKE'S TM - THE EXCHANGE
FYI, The Exchange is a studio, where the mastering was done, and Mike is an engineer who did it: http://www.exchangemastering.co.uk/mike.html
Equipment:
Turntable: Music Hall MMF-5 with Goldring 1012GX (default) cartridge
Preamp: dunno, something in my amplifier :)
Soundcard: Creative SoundBlaster Audigy SE
Software: Linux with ALSA drivers for soundcard, Audacity for mastering. Encoded with flac version 1.2.1 using the highest compression.
It was ripped from a mint record on the first play.
Grabbed in 48 kHz 32bit (really it's 24bit (i hope) converted to 32bit), then normalized, then converted to 16bit.
If you want to burn these files on CD, you would need to resample them to 44.1 kHz.
I used 48 kHz for 2 reasons - no downsampling and audio won't be resampled when played on computer - most of the modern audiocards don't support 44.1 kHz output, but i think almost all can play 48 kHz audio.
CD version of this album is awfully mastered, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loudness_war
Hope you will enjoy this rip, it has no clipping, so sound should be better than on CD version.
Photos of cover and labels are included.
Released by parafin.

Tracklist:
01-Deeper And Deeper (The Juan MacLean Club Mix).flac
02-Kingdom (Booka Shade Club Remix).flac
03-Love Will Leave (Kap10kurt Remix).flac
04-Use You (Maps Remix).flac
05-Deeper And Deeper (T. Raumschmiere Remix Extended).flac
06-Kingdom (Digitalism Remix).flac
07-Saw Something (Onur Ozer Remix).flac
08-Deeper And Deeper (Sebastien Leger Remix).flac
